titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant-Colonel Sir Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident in the Persian Gulf to Lieutenant-Colonel John Macdonald, Envoy to the Court of Persia

mods.abstract: The letter concerns Sued Humza [referred to elsewhere in the volume as Syeed Hamza] of Johanna [Nzwane], whose bugla [buggalow] had been plundered near Boordekhan in the territory of the Sheikh of Dashtee [Dashti]. Stannus asks Macdonald to make an appeal to His Royal Highness: this, he thinks, would doubtless induce the authorities at Shiraz to take more vigorous measures to ensure the restitution of the property.The letter is erroneously dated 16 May 1816.
